isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - CATERPILLAR 3176B/3406E ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - 1994 -

svcsubsecinfo.para: This section covers International installed components and circuits that directly interact with the Caterpillar 3176B and 3406E engines.

item.para: Provides operation descriptions of International installed components and related circuits that work with the Caterpillar Electronic Engine Controls.
Provides Troubleshooting Charts for those circuits and components installed by International.
Provides circuit diagrams and connector composites for International electrical circuits.

svcsubsecinfo.para: The Caterpillar Electronic Troubleshooting Guide should be used to diagnose the engine control system.

This section does not provide engine diagnostics, but does provide step-by-step troubleshooting charts for International installed components and circuits. The charts in this section should be used when the Caterpillar Electronic Troubleshooting Guide indicates a problem may be present in a International circuit or component.

para.emph: Only systems that include International installed components and/or circuits are discussed in this section.

svcsubsecinfo.para: Refer to the appropriate Caterpillar Service Literature for additional information.
